citations.narrative:
When the inspector arrived at the physical address listed as the inspection site for the registrant, the current tenants said
no one by the registrant's name resided at the facility. When contact was made with the registrant, they confirmed that
they moved and had not updated their address with USDA APHIS Animal Care. A registrant shall notify the Deputy
Administrator by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or other change in operations affecting
its status as an exhibitor, carrier, or intermediate handler, within 10 days after making such change.
Correct by 18 September 2023.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45pm on 06-SEP-
2023. An inspector called the registrant at 2:51pm and was able to make contact; the registrant confirmed that no
responsible adult was able to be present for an inspection that day.
End Section

narrative:
2.27(a) 
   
Notification of change of operation. 
When the inspector arrived at the physical address listed as the inspection site for the registrant, the current tenants said 
no one by the registrant's name resided at the facility. When contact was made with the registrant, they confirmed that 
they moved and had not updated their address with USDA APHIS Animal Care. A registrant shall notify the Deputy 
Administrator by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or other change in operations affecting 
its status as an exhibitor, carrier, or intermediate handler, within 10 days after making such change. 
 
Correct by 18 September 2023. 
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45pm on 06-SEP-
2023. An inspector called the registrant at 2:51pm and was able to make contact; the registrant confirmed that no 
responsible adult was able to be present for an inspection that day. 
 
 
End Section
